description: Put a smile on someone's dial with this easy pizza recipe. These salami and cheese heart-shaped pizzas are adorable and delicious.
name: Heart-shaped pizzas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fan-forced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.
Divide each dough ball in half. Working with 1 dough portion at a time, press and shape into a 10 x 15cm heart shape. Transfer dough hearts to trays. Spread each dough heart evenly with sauce.
Using small heart-shaped cutters, cut hearts from salami, reserving scraps.
Tear scraps and place on bases. Sprinkle over cheese, then top with salami hearts. Bake for 12 minutes or until cheese has melted and salami is golden. Serve scattered with basil.
